Title: Relates to limiting the moratorium on evictions during the COVID-19 emergency to property owners with ten or less units
Summary: Limits the moratorium on evictions during the COVID emergency to owners of more than ten residential units; provides for the expiration of the eviction moratorium on June 30, 2021.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 381 of the laws of 2020 establishing the "COVID-19 Emergency Eviction and Foreclosure Prevention Act of 2020", in relation to excluding property owners with ten or less units and in relation to the effectiveness of such chapter
